name: ALBERT GALLATIN AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT, Avonworth School District, South Park School District, and West Allegheny School District, Respondents v. The PENNSYLVANIA CYBER CHARTER SCHOOL, Petitioner
name_abbreviation: Albert Gallatin Area School District v. Pennsylvania Cyber Charter School

parties: ALBERT GALLATIN AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT, Avonworth School District, South Park School District, and West Allegheny School District, Respondents v. The PENNSYLVANIA CYBER CHARTER SCHOOL, Petitioner

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 2nd day of November, 2016, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

casebody.head_matter:
160 A.3d 786
ALBERT GALLATIN AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT, Avonworth School District, South Park School District, and West Allegheny School District, Respondents v. The PENNSYLVANIA CYBER CHARTER SCHOOL, Petitioner

November 2, 2016
